Updates might not show up right away on your asset. In this case, wait some seconds and reload your asset details page in your browser.

data.name: description
data.label: New Description
data.help: Add a thorough description with as much detail as possible. You can use [Markdown](https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/basics).

fields.title: URL
fields.label: File
fields.help: This URL will be stored encrypted after publishing. **Please make sure that the endpoint is accessible over the internet and is not protected by a firewall or by credentials.**
fields.computeHelp: For a compute dataset, your file should match the file type required by the algorithm, and should not exceed 1 GB in file size.

data.name: usesConsumerParameters
data.label: Algorithm custom parameters
data.help: Algorithm custom parameters are used to define required consumer input before running the algorithm in a Compute-to-Data environment.
options: This asset uses algorithm custom parameters

data.name: allow
data.label: Allow ETH Address
data.help: Enter an ETH address and click the ADD button to append to the list. Only ETH addresses in the allow list can consume this asset. If the list is empty anyone can download or compute this asset.

data.name: deny
data.label: Deny ETH Address
data.help: Enter an ETH address and click the ADD button to append to the list. If an ETH address is in the deny list, download or compute of this asset will be denied for that ETH address.

data.name: assetState
data.label: Asset Status
data.help: This asset will no longer be visible to other users and it won't be possible to purchase it.  More info available in our [docs](https://docs.oceanprotocol.com/core-concepts/did-ddo#state).

data.name: license
data.label: License
data.help: A SPDX identifier of the license applicable to this service.

data.name: accessTermsAndConditions
data.title: URL
data.label: Terms and Conditions
data.help: The Terms and Conditions under which this service can be accessed. A resolvable link to the T&C document is expected. If no Terms are given the default [terms of this portal](/terms) will be applied.

data.name: dataController
data.label: Data Controller
data.help: The responsible data controller, as defined in the GDPR.

data.name: legalBasis
data.label: Legal Basis
data.help: The legal basis for processing PII. Defined in GDPR.

data.name: purpose
data.label: Purposes
data.help: The purpose of processing the contained PII. It is recommended to use [established vocabulary](https://w3c.github.io/dpv/dpv/#vocab-purpose).
